blocks.text:
Cache strategy: cache positive and negative lookups with short TTL to protect DB from miss-storms. Evict on revoke.
Consistency: write path checks collisions (unique token). In DynamoDB, use conditional put; in SQL, handle duplicate key retry.
Backups: PITR on primary data; tokens are small—backups cheap.
Analytics: async fire-and-forget to Kafka; never block redirect path.
Abuse: shadow-ban suspected domains; async malware scan; flag and quarantine.
Disaster recovery: multi-region active-active for read path; writes geo-partitioned with async replication.

blocks.title: Common Pitfalls
blocks.text:
- Analytics’i redirect path içinde senkron tutmak → latency’yi uçurur.
- Cache miss fırtınasını düşünmemek ve DB’yi boğmak.
- Token çakışmalarını düzgün ele almamak → veri bozulması.
- Tek region DB ile global trafik almaya çalışmak.

blocks.caption: Hot path stays lean; heavy work is async.
